reviewTitle: Great Value for Money, But Fire-Boltt Still Outshines
reviewDescription: I bought this watch yesterday, and here‚Äôs my honest review:The watch has a sleek design, is easy to use, and offers great resolution with a smooth touch experience. However, having used a Fire-Boltt watch for three years, I find it to be a better option overall. The Fire-Boltt‚Äôs Da Fit app offers more watch faces, workout options, fitness programs, and meditation videos. In contrast, the NoiseFit app has fewer watch faces and is less user-friendly.Since I‚Äôve only used this watch for one day, I can‚Äôt comment on the battery life yet. On the plus side, the Bluetooth calling feature works well, with clear audio.For the price of Rs 1999, it‚Äôs definitely value for money.
Good

I am using this watch for 10 days now and feel that it does an average job of what it was expected for and the price paid.Pros :)Looks good on wrist.Only decent number of watch faces.Health apps works OK.Touch screen is goodBattery is good with 7 days life (on average use)Cons :(Alarm is a joke in this watch; you won't hear or feel when it goes on. The Fitbit watch I had earlier has an awesome vibrator.The step counter is many a times erroneous.Sleep quality assessment is also a joke....it takes the time you lie on the bed awake, is also taken as light sleep or REMMost of the health functions are tracked only for a week's time; if you want it for longer time you have to subscribe for GOLD package.The unlimited watch faces mentioned is false... You again need additional subscription.Net-Net you can enjoy only a limited set of features that comes in the basic pkg.... Rest of all comes with an additional recurring fee!
Smart looks amazing and worth for money.  Display is fantastic and battery backup is also good. Cool features. Build quality is good

Watch is easy to wear, light weight and belt is also very comfortable. Weather and sleep is not working in the watch, other features like steps counting and bp monitor works well when wear it properly. One drawback is that if I turn off watch and restart it on next day, then time is not updating automatically. Also, need to sync watch with Noise fit app on day end otherwise app doesn't consider it as a valid value and you can loose your statistics on dy end.

reviewTitle: Good smart watch with AI voice feature.
reviewDescription: Recently purchased Noise brand smart watch reviewing now after my one day usage of this watch.Watch is just awesome with all the features you require for your smart watch & its listed exactly as mentioned, but only i dislike is the vibration mode for notifications is not good at all, bluetooth connection gets disconnected time and again you have to reset it all the time dont know why its not stable once paired with this watch. Also watch charging with the given charging cable it's take time it's not that quick, watch battery last for max 2 days will full charge.Thank you Noise team for this awesome smart watch but what i disliked after my useage hope you come up with some solutions. Bcos of this some features not up to the mark rating this watch 4/ 5.
